attributes.action: Make CCTV and bandit screens a mandatory requirement in all Bookmakers
attributes.additional_details: There are numerous staff left single manning in an unprotected premises daily, with thousands of pounds kept inside. It's almost a daily occurrence whereby a member of staff is threatened, abused or worse. Bookmakers staff are often left to fend for themselves when it comes to these situations. Bandit screens and CCTV should be a legal mandatory requirements for all shops within the industry. Staff health and safety should be number one, and, at the moment, it is severely lacking.
